ai-tha-ap366:0.3_0: he took the flowers of the head, (Sakka) the Elder Supreme Hall,
ai-tha-ap366:1.1_0: I was master of the three knowledges,
ai-tha-ap366:1.2_0: on the slopes of the Himalayas,
ai-tha-ap366:2.2_0: Having prepared a rock, and then
ai-tha-ap366:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap366:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Keṇiya.
ai-tha-ap366:6.1_0: he took the fourth Elder Nun Bhaddiya flowers and quaked,
